snippet.title: HTML5 Media
snippet.description: HTML5 Media / Powers, Shelley If you're a web developer or designer familiar with CSS and JavaScript, this tightly focused introduction shows you how to add HTML5 media elements to your web pages, and how to provide custom controls for letting web visitors interact with the content [...] Sebastopol : O'Reilly Media, 2011. - 138 p.

snippet.title: iLife '05 : The Missing Manual
snippet.description: iLife '05 : The Missing Manual / Pogue, David The incomparable iLife '05 is the must-have multimedia suite for everyone who owns a Mac--and the envy of everyone who doesn't [...] Sebastopol : O'Reilly Media, Inc, 2005. - 744 p. ebook
